Class GetGamesController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.planningpoker.controller.GetGamesController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class GetGamesController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This controller responds by sending request to get games from remote server.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Team9
